name: Key: Maze of Illusions
description:
Key: Maze of Illusions is one of those action platform games that gets the player hooked on rage and the thirst to overcome all obstacles in their path. In this adventure, you are Zeno, a green creature who has been left in a dangerous dungeon filled with rooms full of enemies and cruel traps.



But how did he get there? His family was attacked, and where are they now? What really happened? Answering these questions and taking revenge on the person responsible for this tragedy is part of his goals. And most importantly: to find the keys to every room in the dungeon, for only then will Zeno be closer to knowing the whole truth.



  • The exciting and dramatic story adventure will take place in the 33 rooms of the dungeon, which are divided into 3 worlds: earth, hell and heaven. In addition, 3 challenging bosses will be waiting to be defeated.



  • In addition to the single-player story mode, the game also features local multiplayer (and soon online multiplayer), which contains 9 modes to play with up to 8 friends. They are: Race, Race for the Key, Capture the Flag, Team, Last Man, Tag, Professional, Sumo and Team Death Match.
    (Multiplayer with controls are being fixed and will not be available on the release date. The Shared/Split Screen multiplayer with keyboard works normally, we apologize for the inconvenience)



  • Walk, run, jump, and shoot to avoid and overcome traps and enemies.
  • For better gameplay, the game features 3 languages (English, Portuguese and Spanish), 3 difficulty levels (easy, medium and hard), 4 different controls and support for PS4 and Xbox One controls.
  • Beautiful graphics inspired by the classic 8-bit style, but with small modern details, such as dynamic lighting, making the game even more beautiful and interesting.
